name: iprodev/php-easycache
description: PHP EasyCache is a lightweight, multi-backend (APCu/Redis/File/PDO) with SWR caching library that speeds up repeated API calls with thread‑safe writes, per‑key TTLs, automatic cleanup, key sanitization, and optional compression.

suggest.ext-apcu: To use APCu backend for ultra-fast in-memory caching
suggest.ext-redis: To use phpredis for Redis backend
suggest.predis/predis: ^2.0 - To use predis client instead of phpredis
suggest.ext-zlib: To use GzipCompressor for data compression
suggest.ext-zstd: To use ZstdCompressor for faster data compression

scripts.docs: echo 'See API.md, README.md, and EXAMPLES.md for documentation'

scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Run tests with HTML coverage report
scripts-descriptions.test:filter: Run specific test by name (e.g., composer test:filter testSetAndGet)
scripts-descriptions.stan:baseline: Generate PHPStan baseline for existing issues
scripts-descriptions.qa: Run all quality assurance checks (cs, stan, test)
